hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim, from his father, that:The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said: "Whoever drags his garment out of pride, Allah will not look at him on the Day of Resurrection." Abu Bakr said: "O Messenger of Allah, one side of my Izar slips unless I pay attention to it." The Prophet [SAW]: "You are not one of those who do that out of pride

chapter.eng-name: Isbal Al-Izar (Letting the Izar Hang Below the Ankles)
